title: Reportify — Web App
description: Developed a Python-based web application that converts YouTube video content into comprehensive text reports, complete with summaries and transcripts. Implemented machine learning algorithms for summarization and YouTube APIs for data retrieval.

title: Sentiment Analysis — Web App
description: Developed a sentiment analysis model using ml5.js, a JavaScript library for machine learning and creative coding. The model efficiently scores the sentiment of text, assigning values between 0 ('negative') and 1 ('positive') to gauge the emotional tone of textual data.

title: Zodiac — Android App
description: Engineered an Android app, Zodiac, leveraging Java and Android SDK, to provide astrology-based horoscopes. Implemented API integration for dynamic content delivery.

title: Vocab Squares — Chrome Extension
description: Empowered users to rapidly expand their word knowledge by accessing synonyms, definitions, and example sentences of words.
